title: cittamellAm enakku
sahitya:
cittamellAm enakku shivamayamE unnai sEvitta karangaLukku nilai vaLamE


anupallavi

  ammaiyillAmAl oru attanillai appanillAmAl oru piLLaiyillai shiva


caraNam 1    bhakti prukkil inda mUruruvE anda paravashattinuLLE uyir uruga
shaktiyellAm pirandu shivam peruga en sandadiyE undanukku aDi paNiya iraivA
    caraNam 2    kaNNai tiranda vaitta karut-poruLE kOvil kadavai tiranda vaitta aruTkaDalE
peNNainallUr uraiyum aruTkaDalE ninaivenru AtkoLLum arum poruLE iraivA
